title: Choose your delivery date
error_loading: Failed to load delivery dates. Please refresh the page and try again.
error_unexpected_data: Received unexpected data from the server. Please contact support if this persists.
error_saving: Failed to save delivery date. Please try selecting a date again.
error_saving_shipping: Failed to save shipping method. Please refresh the page.
no_dates_available: No delivery dates are currently available.
no_dates_after_minimum_delivery: No delivery dates available after the minimum delivery date of {{date}}. Please contact customer service.
error_boundary_message: We encountered an unexpected error while loading the delivery date picker. Please refresh the page or contact support if the issue persists.
error_network: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_timeout: Request timed out. Please try again in a moment.
error_server: Server temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_validation: Invalid data provided. Please check your selection and try again.
stock_check_failed: Stock check failed. Delivery date will be determined by ERP.
dutchned_delivery: Dutchned (Expedition) delivery - Next 14 available dates from API:
post_delivery: POST delivery - Standard delivery calendar with mock dates:
post_delivery_info: Ordered before 10:00 PM, delivered the next business day
erp_delivery_info: Delivery date will be determined by ERP system
stock_check_out_of_stock: Some products are out of stock. Delivery date will be determined by ERP.
